Dask Expressions
================

Dask DataFrames with query optimization.

This is a rewrite of Dask DataFrame that includes query
optimization and generally improved organization.

More in our blog posts:
- [Dask Expressions overview](https://blog.dask.org/2023/08/25/dask-expr-introduction)
- [TPC-H benchmark results vs. Dask DataFrame](https://docs.coiled.io/blog/tpch.html)

Stability
---------

This is the default backend for dask.DataFrame since version 2024.3.0.

API Coverage
------------

Dask-Expr covers almost everything of the Dask DataFrame API. The only missing features are:

- named GroupBy Aggregations

usage_description:
Here is a 2-sentence summary of what a developer can achieve with this library:

This library is used to accelerate and optimize high-level data processing operations on Dask DataFrames, leveraging query optimization for improved performance. With dask-expr, developers can write complex queries in an expression tree format that gets optimized and executed efficiently, making it suitable as the default backend for Dask DataFrames since version 2024.3.0.
